title: The latest issue of Quanta Math and Science (online, free)
Training a Single Output Multilinear Regression Model in PyTorch
description: A neural network architecture is built with hundreds of neurons where each of them takes in multiple inputs to perform a multilinear regression operation for prediction. In the previous tutorials, we built a single output multilinear regression model that used only a forward function for prediction.

title: What to expect from AI in 2023
